snippet: Expenditures on security-related activity in Aba prefecture have been growing since 2002, Human Rights Watch reported, rising to well above the average for non-Tibetan parts of Sichuan.
lead_paragraph: Expenditures on security-related activity in Aba prefecture have been growing since 2002, Human Rights Watch reported, rising to well above the average for non-Tibetan parts of Sichuan.

headline.main: Study Points to Heavy-Handed Repression of Tibetan Area in China
headline.print_headline: China: Unrest Follows Increase In Security Budget, Group Reports
